summary: Set ten years after the most peaceful revolution in United States history, it presents a dystopia in which the issues of many groups - minorities, liberals, gay rights organizations, feminists - are dealt with by the government.
cast: Honey|Adele Bertei|Jean Satterfield|Florynce Kennedy|Becky Johnston|Pat Murphy|Kathryn Bigelow|Hillary Hurst|Sheila McLaughlin|Marty Pottenger|Lynne Jones|Ron Vawter|John Coplans|John Rudolph|Warner Schreiner|Valerie Smaldone|John McLearen|Pat Place|Julia Hanlon|Maria David|Toviana Starks|Cat Hightower|Veronica Campbell|Mayumi Sakaguchi|Ryan|Chris Brewer|Bill Tatum|Jorge Ramos|Júlio Peña|Merián Soto|Mark Boone Junior|Dana Johnson|Jerry Nixon|Gary Valdes|Dirk Zimmer|Jacques Sandulescu|Gary Hill|Sis McQuader|Susan Sawyer|Sherry Rosso|Donna Allegra Simms|Valerie Jones|Ramona Galindez|Katy Taylor|Marion Benjamin|Joan Ellis|Carolyn Fitzgerald|Alice Sullivan|Belle Chevigny|Paul Zonghetti|Alexa Evans|Malick N'Diaye|Dolly Udemzue|Barbara Scott|Hanita|Diane Jacobs|Felice Rosser|Hal Miller|Peggy Lee Brennan|Michael Sullivan|Nancy Reilly|Rosemary Hochschild|Vanessa Zannis|Sheila Carr|Ed Bowes|Allan Ryan|Kathy Gunst|Amy Chen|Patrick Brogan|Edmead Smith|Mike Bencivenga|Eric Bogosian|Gregory Samuels|Walter Scheuer|Paul Chevigny|Joel Kovel|Bill Sturgis|Tom Whittaker
title: Born in Flames
